patterns: itching and skin rash and nodal skin eruptions and dischromic  patches
response: You may possibly have Fungal infection.

patterns: continuous sneezing and shivering and chills and watering from eyes
stomach pain and acidity and ulcers on tongue and vomiting and cough and chest pain
itching and vomiting and yellowish skin and nausea and loss of appetite and abdominal pain and yellowing of eyes
response: You may possibly have Chronic cholestasis.

patterns: itching and skin rash and stomach pain and burning micturition and spotting  urination
response: You may possibly have Drug Reaction.

patterns: vomiting and indigestion and loss of appetite and abdominal pain and passage of gases and internal itching
response: You may possibly have Peptic ulcer diseae.

patterns: fatigue and weight loss and restlessness and lethargy and irregular sugar level and blurred and distorted vision and obesity and excessive hunger and increased appetite and polyuria
vomiting and sunken eyes and dehydration and diarrhoea
fatigue and cough and high fever and breathlessness and family history and mucoid sputum
response: You may possibly have Bronchial Asthma.

patterns: headache and chest pain and dizziness and loss of balance and lack of concentration
acidity and indigestion and headache and blurred and distorted vision and excessive hunger and stiff neck and depression and irritability and visual disturbances
back pain and weakness in limbs and neck pain and dizziness and loss of balance
response: You may possibly have Cervical spondylosis.

patterns: vomiting and headache and weakness of one body side and altered sensorium
response: You may possibly have Paralysis (brain hemorrhage).

patterns: itching and vomiting and fatigue and weight loss and high fever and yellowish skin and dark urine and abdominal pain
chills and vomiting and high fever and sweating and headache and nausea and diarrhoea and muscle pain
itching and skin rash and fatigue and lethargy and high fever and headache and loss of appetite and mild fever and swelled lymph nodes and malaise and red spots over body
response: You may possibly have Chicken pox.

patterns: skin rash and chills and joint pain and vomiting and fatigue and high fever and headache and nausea and loss of appetite and pain behind the eyes and back pain and malaise and muscle pain and red spots over body
chills and vomiting and fatigue and high fever and headache and nausea and constipation and abdominal pain and diarrhoea and toxic look (typhos) and belly pain
joint pain and vomiting and yellowish skin and dark urine and nausea and loss of appetite and abdominal pain and diarrhoea and mild fever and yellowing of eyes and muscle pain
response: You may possibly have hepatitis A.

patterns: itching and fatigue and lethargy and yellowish skin and dark urine and loss of appetite and abdominal pain and yellow urine and yellowing of eyes and malaise and receiving blood transfusion and receiving unsterile injections
response: You may possibly have Hepatitis B.

patterns: fatigue and yellowish skin and nausea and loss of appetite and yellowing of eyes and family history
response: You may possibly have Hepatitis C.

patterns: joint pain and vomiting and fatigue and yellowish skin and dark urine and nausea and loss of appetite and abdominal pain and yellowing of eyes
response: You may possibly have Hepatitis D.

patterns: joint pain and vomiting and fatigue and high fever and yellowish skin and dark urine and nausea and loss of appetite and abdominal pain and yellowing of eyes and acute liver failure and coma and stomach bleeding
response: You may possibly have Hepatitis E.

patterns: vomiting and yellowish skin and abdominal pain and swelling of stomach and distention of abdomen and history of alcohol consumption and fluid overload
response: You may possibly have Alcoholic hepatitis.

patterns: chills and vomiting and fatigue and weight loss and cough and high fever and breathlessness and sweating and loss of appetite and mild fever and yellowing of eyes and swelled lymph nodes and malaise and phlegm and chest pain and blood in sputum

continuous sneezing and chills and fatigue and cough and high fever and headache and swelled lymph nodes and malaise and phlegm and throat irritation and redness of eyes and sinus pressure and runny nose and congestion and chest pain and loss of smell and muscle pain
response: You may possibly have Common Cold.

patterns: chills and fatigue and cough and high fever and breathlessness and sweating and malaise and phlegm and chest pain and fast heart rate and rusty sputum
constipation and pain during bowel movements and pain in anal region and bloody stool and irritation in anus
response: You may possibly have Dimorphic hemmorhoids(piles).

patterns: vomiting and breathlessness and sweating and chest pain
response: You may possibly have Heart attack.

patterns: fatigue and cramps and bruising and obesity and swollen legs and swollen blood vessels and prominent veins on calf
response: You may possibly have Varicose veins.

patterns: fatigue and weight gain and cold hands and feets and mood swings and lethargy and dizziness and puffy face and eyes and enlarged thyroid and brittle nails and swollen extremeties and depression and irritability and abnormal menstruation
fatigue and mood swings and weight loss and restlessness and sweating and diarrhoea and fast heart rate and excessive hunger and muscle weakness and irritability and abnormal menstruation

vomiting and fatigue and anxiety and sweating and headache and nausea and blurred and distorted vision and excessive hunger and drying and tingling lips and slurred speech and irritability and palpitations
joint pain and neck pain and knee pain and hip joint pain and swelling joints and painful walking
muscle weakness and stiff neck and swelling joints and movement stiffness and painful walking
skin rash and pus filled pimples and blackheads and scurring
burning micturition and bladder discomfort and foul smell of urine and continuous feel of urine
response: You may possibly have Urinary tract infection.

patterns: skin rash and joint pain and skin peeling and silver like dusting and small dents in nails and inflammatory nails
